data.text: After Yahweh had rescued David from Saul and his other enemies, David sang a song to Yahweh.
This is what he sang:
Yahweh, you protect me; you are like a shield;
I call out to you, Yahweh;
“ almost died [PRS]; it was like [MET] a huge wave had crashed over me,
I thought that I would die; it was as though death wrapped ropes around me;
But when I was ◄very distressed/in great trouble►, I called out to you, Yahweh;
“hen it was as though the earth quaked and shook;
It was as though smoke poured out of your nostrils
You tore open the sky and came down;
You rode through the sky on a winged creature;
The darkness surrounded you, like a blanket;
Out of the lightning in front of you
Then, Yahweh, you spoke like thunder from the sky;
When you sent flashes of lightning,
Then the bottom of the ocean was uncovered;
“Yahweh, you reached down from heaven and lifted me up;
You rescued me from my strong enemies,
They attacked me when I was experiencing troubles/difficulties,
You brought me to a place where I was safe;
“Yahweh, you rewarded me because I do what is right;
Yahweh, I have obeyed your laws;
All of your regulations were in my mind,
You know that I have not done anything that is evil;
So you have rewarded me in return for my doing what is right,
“Yahweh, you are faithful/loyal to those who always trust in you;
You act sincerely toward those whose inner beings are pure,
You rescue those who are humble,
Yahweh, you are like [MET] a lamp
With your strength/help I can run through a line of enemy soldiers
“My God whom I worship, everything that you do is perfect;
Yahweh, you are [RHQ] the only one who is God;
God, you whom I worship are a strong refuge for me;
When I walk in the mountains,
You teach me how to fight in a battle
It is as though [MET] you have given me a shield
You have not allowed my enemies to capture me [IDM],
“ pursued my enemies and defeated them;
I struck them down; I stabbed them with my sword;
You have given me strength for fighting battles
You caused my enemies to turn and run away from me;
They ◄looked for/wanted► someone to rescue them, but no one did.
I crushed them, and as a result they became like [SIM] tiny particles of dust.
“You rescued me from those who tried to rebel against me,
Foreigners humbly bowed down in front of me;
They became afraid,
“Yahweh, you are alive! I praise you! You are like [MET] a huge overhanging rock under which I am safe/protected!
You enable me to conquer my enemies;
You delivered me from my enemies;
Because of all that, I exalt you among many people-groups
You enable me, whom you appointed to be king, to powerfully conquer my enemies;
